sentence.idiomatic: Are you a fan of director Zhang Yimou?
I've heard that he is a movie buff.
The success of that movie brought him a lot of fans.
I really admire the composition of this drawing you did.
The integrated composition of the writing with the artwork is pretty good.
The unique storyline is the most characteristic thing about this composition.
Higher education in China is becoming more and more common.
His movies aren't mainstream.
The service at this restaurant is first class, but the prices are average.
Watching a comedy makes people feel relaxed.
Are his comedies popular?
He is good at performing comedies.
I most look forward to the "New Year's Celebration" movie that comes out at the end of the year.
I've heard that this year's New Year's celebration programs are brilliant.
This is the best New Year's present that I've received.
This fantasy movie set in ancient China is very interesting.
I like reading fantasy novels.
Who is your favorite fantasy character from ancient China?
His rule was overturned.
This discovery overturns our previous conclusion.
Studying about the West does not mean that we undermine our own culture.
They are swarming to watch the soccer game.
A few years ago, everybody was swarming to get an MBA.
The phenomenon of swarming to buy a house won't occur now.
He didn't continue on in his father's profession.
This project will continue to carry on the composition of the last project.
Don't you want to carry on your ancestors' culture?
This movie greatly impressed me.
This kind of shock no one would be able to bear.
In your entire life, who has given you the biggest jolt?
You have so many DVDs! You are really a real movie buff.

I collect movies from quite a few different countries. I especially like to watch European independent films. Their story lines are extremely unique. Some are light and humorous, whereas others are serious and dark. In a word, they are very different from commercial films. What movies do you like to watch?

My style is more mainstream. I like romantic comedies and action films. Hollywood-style films are all pretty good. Feng Xiaogang is my favorite Chinese director. Every year I look forward to his "New Year Comedy".

Well, this year you are going to be disappointed because he shot a medieval period style film instead. It's completely different from his previous style. I really don't understand why all the Chinese directors are flocking to this type of film now. It's Wang Kar-wai that stays true to himself. Different themes can all be filmed with one's own character.

That's true. His movies really have their own style. Although sometimes I don't understand them, I still get caught up in their distinctive moods. He's in the United States right now shooting a romantic comedy. I wonder if he will continue with his own style.
Have you seen any French New Wave movies from the 50's or 60's? For those used to realism or other common styles, they're just mind-blowing.

word.literal: to turn one\'s mind to something

sentence.idiomatic: I definitely wouldn't understand those. There are so many pressures in real life, why would I want to watch movies that require mental exertion? So, my favorites are still silly comedies, science fiction, and similar light-hearted themes. Also, Lord of the Rings and similar legendary epic-style dramas are also pretty good.
It looks like the styles of movies that we appreciate are really different.

word.literal: to bringing in the new year, New Year’s celebrations
Stephen Chow, a famous actor and director
special comma used to set off items in a series
